news.content: Nov. 2018 Professor Mianxiong Dong received the National Institute of Science and Technology Policy (NISTEP) Award 2018 (The Researchers with Nice Step).
Feb. 26, 2020 Professor Mianxiong Dong received the FY 2019 Hokkaido Science and Technology Incentive Award (令和元年度 北海道科学技術奨励賞).
Nov. 28, 2020 Undergraduate Ayaka Oki received first prize of The 12th IEEE Career Development Essay Contest Award.
